channel.title: I dont know how to make a priv server please tell
channel.description: the name explains all can someone post on here how to make one please :confused:

item.title: I dont know how to make a priv server please tell
item.dc:creator: @_mike2 ^mike^
item.description:
@_mike2 wrote:

1st.
go to www.no-ip.com and register.
2nd.
once you log in look to the left and under hosts/redirects click add.
3rd.
select your name ip and all that.
4th.
go to the downloads and click your computer type and download no-ip DUC.
5th.
install it then open it, then click the little box with your server name in it then exit.
6th.
now go to www.portfoward.com, click routers then find your router.
7th.
next, click 1st SMTP Server
8th.
then follow there steps on how to get a static ip.
9th.
then follow there steps on how to log into ur router and change everything. Then ur done
(note. when it says start and end port, put 43594) hope this helps ALOT!

Read full topic
item.source: I dont know how to make a priv server please tell
